name: 設計概論
description: This course is a fundamental level class structured for the student who plan to pursue a career in design field. Students will experience the design process through developing their own project and facing the difficulty of dealing with real material, form and compositions.
goals: Cultivate the basic concepts and literacy students need to have in design profession.
Improve students' judgment and aesthetic value in visual observation.
Enable students to have a wide range of relevant knowledge and comprehensive abilities of creating more ideal life by design.
Understand how design can potentially improve human life by incorporating the new technologies for the future.
Encourage students to pay enough attention to the potential of design and show it concretely in "object, information, environment", and can get practice in real life.
syllabus: 1\. 透過有關書籍、圖片、幻燈片、光碟和錄影帶資料，解說和設計相關領的理論。參觀相關設計展覽，師生以互動方式討論。2\. 平時作業：每兩週一次為原則3\. 期中：口頭報告，期末：書面報告4\. 每週上課後兩小時為補救教學時間。
